summary: Passionate Software AI Engineer with a strong background in machine learning and AI frameworks. Experienced in developing AI-driven solutions to address real-world challenges. Skilled in Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-learn.

employment.responsibilities: Developed meta-learning framework for medical image denoising...
Investigated NLP solutions for low-resource language processing...
Designed an attention-based model and training objective for retrieving multiple cloud properties...

projects.title: Transliteration-Based Language Identification
projects.description: Developed a BERT-BiGRU model to classify Bangla, Hindi, Tamil, and English in transliterated text...

projects.title: Multi-Persona (LLMs) AI Chatbot with Google Gemini 1.5
projects.description: Developed an AI chatbot with three unique personas...
